metadata.title: CVE-2022-48708 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:pinctrl: single: fix potential NULL dereference Added checking of pointer"function" in pcs_set_mux(). pinmux_generic_get_function() can return NULLand the pointer "function" was dereferenced without checking against NULL.Found by Linux Verification Center (linuxtesting.org) with SVACE.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
